body:
It's been great playing on avicus for one and a half years, I've really seen how the server has grown and each time the lobby improves. But unfortunately my time is over, my step sisters messed it up for me. I've met some amazing people, torirawrjade, justneed and my minds gone blank but everyone else I've met enjoy the rest of your lives Ahah ^.^ I'm not trusted on the server anymore so I'm not allowed on anymore. So see you all, stay fab :)
- Lottie

title: Farewell
